column2: Table 7: Extent of Quantification by activities Summary of Performance by Outputs Activity details-Analysis Category of outputs Fully quantified outputs Insufficiently quantified outputs Outputs not quantified % of total out- puts samp led Expe nditu re UGX Bn % propo rtion to total expe nditu re No. of out put s sa mpl ed 5 50 0.507 5.4 18 18 Total no of activi ties in the outp uts No. of Fully Quan tified activi ties No. of activiti es not fully quantif ied % of quantificat ion of activities per category of output 3 30 8.83 94.5 15 8 2 20 0 0 2 0 0 7 2 100 53 0 Total 10 100 9.34 100 35 26 9 observed that in cases where outputs were either partially or not quantified, management reported performance in generic ways such as boundary markers erected without specifying the number of boundary markers erected. to plan and report on the quality/quantity of activities implemented renders it difficult to establish the reasonableness of individual activity costs for each planned output which curtails effective accountability when funds are subsequently spent. Further, without clearly and fully quantified outputs, I could not ascertain the level of achievement of these outputs and whether funds appropriated by both URC Board, Minister, and Parliament (for Government support) released to the Corporation were spent appropriately and the intended objectives achieved. explained that this was due to planning and budgeting gaps within the Corporation. The Planning Unit is in its infancy stage and inadequately staffed. I Failure Management

5.5 Implementation of quantified outputs assessed the implementation of Five (5) outputs that were fully quantified with a total of eighteen (18) activities worth UGX 0.507Bn and noted the following; The entity did not fully implement any output over the FY 2019/2020. One (1) output with a total of two (2) activities worth UGX 0.507Bn was partially implemented. The entity implemented both activities partially. Four (4) outputs with a total of sixteen (16) activities worth were not implemented at all. That is the entity did not implement all the sixteen (16) activities (0%) within the outputs. to Table 8 for a summary of the extent of implementation and amounts spent. I    Refer
column14: I advised the Accounting Officer to ensure that internally generated revenue is accurately budgeted for and followed up for collection and to follow up with the relevant authorities to adequate GOU funding support.
